The pain is common to all people. Those who can mourn at the same time are the ones who can feel the sadness of their brother like their own sadness.
Within 77 million, how happy is the joy of my love, and the sadness of those who are upset is my sadness.
As the prime minister of this country, I expressly state that even a sheep grazing on the edge of the Tigris is under my responsibility.

Today we opened the Arab Media Forum in its 13th year. An Arab media platform for enriching dialogue, presenting ideas and drawing attention to the reality and future of the media.
The formulation, circulation and dissemination of information has seen a revolution in form over the past years. But the real content and the honest word remains what we are always looking for
Our definition of the media has changed. Our view of the real influencers has changed, and our social and political reality has changed. We must understand and understand these variables.
The Arab Media Forum is the largest gathering of Arab media. I hope that the conference environment will be stimulating, rich and inspiring to shape a better future for our Arab media.

The talks within the visit will facilitate further development of relations between the two countries.
We attach great importance to these relations and these relations are developing successfully.
Today Azerbaijan declares its position in the world as an independent state.
The main reason for our support is that we always have an independent path, pursue an independent foreign policy, as well as an active regional policy.
Our position is based on the principles of international law and justice.
Looking at the history of Azerbaijan's development, once again you assure that national interests are above all (cont) http://t.co/1iGmUIMCTO
We pursue our policy on the basis of national development and strengthening our independence.
We have been the founder of our own destiny, we set our priorities and our future.
There can be no greater happiness in the world.
There is tolerance and tolerance in Azerbaijan. Our people are very hospitable. Azerbaijan is a multinational country.
There has never been any confusion, confrontation, or conflicts on national and religious grounds.
Armenians, as representatives of all other nations, lived in Azerbaijan, enjoying all the blessings.
Unfortunately, the nationalist forces who came to power in Armenia started a war against our country.
As a result of this war, our territories were occupied, and our citizens were forced to leave their hometowns.
The UN Security Council has requested four (cont) http://t.co/fpFCbN4PNc to demand the withdrawal of Armenian occupying forces from Azerbaijan
No sanctions against Armenia, no international condemnation. This is the reason why the conflict has not been resolved so far.
Azerbaijan will strengthen its economic, military and political potential. We want our native land - Karabakh, (cont) http://t.co/JjCvZThM87
Projects implemented in Azerbaijan have completely changed the region's energy map.
For the first time, we have combined the Caspian region with the Black Sea and the Mediterranean region through oil and gas pipelines.
This allows us and our neighbors to use more oil and gas resources more efficiently.
